t: Amazon.com: New Traditions - Tree Topper and Mini Bow Bundle (Classic Red Tartan Plaid) : Home & Kitchen
s: On the back of the ribbon is three ties..on for the bow and two for the long pieces. Do not touch the one in the middle, that will untie the bow..just pull that up and through..then your bow will not fall apart. The ties are how all bows are made so this is not a new concept.
